definitions.definition: An instrument or tool used for picking things up without touching them with the hands or fingers , consisting of two slats or grips hinged at the end or in the middle, and sometimes including a spring to open the grips.

( by extension ) A large scissors-like two-piece center-hinged forged-iron implement with oval-loop handles and with pointed tips turned inward (in the same plane as and perpendicular to the handles) to facilitate lifting and carrying a block of ice. Often called ice tongs .

main_definition: An instrument or tool used for picking things up without touching them with the hands or fingers , consisting of two slats or grips hinged at the end or in the middle, and sometimes including a spring to open the grips.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A large scissors-like two-piece center-hinged forged-iron implement with oval-loop handles and with pointed tips turned inward (in the same plane as and perpendicular to the handles) to facilitate lifting and carrying a block of ice. Often called ice tongs .

definitions.definition: plural of tong ( “ Chinese secret society ” )

main_definition: plural of tong ( “ Chinese secret society ” )
